author: GameMasterGuy

text: After I uploaded the last Earthbound track, I got a sudden urge to remix the hospital theme. Some quirky voices because it's a quirky game. I think the last time I made a remix was in 2008. Making covers and remixes back then was what helped me learn to use FL Studio for my original compositions.
author: SupraDarky
